hero.title: CLOAKDB
hero.feature1Description: Extract schema + relationships. Filter by table, rows, columns.
hero.feature2Description: TypeScript-based rules. Transform PII before export.
hero.feature3Description: Version complex DB states. Restore deterministic test data.

restoration.title: Restoration Tool
items: Connect to your production database and dump data to your dev environment
Smart filtering: Restore only what you need (e.g., '5 users + all related data')
Automatic foreign key traversal + explicit table includes
Start with PostgreSQL, extend to other databases

anonymization.title: Anonymization Tool
items: Define anonymization rules using Faker mappings
Transform sensitive fields before data touches your local machine

useCases.title: Use Cases
useCases.subtitle: The Differentiator
items: Save and restore specific test scenarios with one click
Example: 'User with 3 pending items, one past due'
Perfect for QA, demos, and repeatable testing workflows

howItWorks.title: From Production to Safe Dev Database
howItWorks.description: Cloak DB captures your production schema, identifies sensitive fields, and automatically generates anonymized data that looks real but protects privacy.
benefits: Automatic detection of PII (emails, names, phones)
Custom anonymization rules for your domain
Export to SQL, CSV, or direct database connection
